T02mahpratu:1: lokārthasiddhiparamaṃ bahuratnacitraṃ saddharmakośam asamaṃ śravaṇāya dhīrāḥ |
T02mahpratu:3: āryām imāṃ pratisarāṃ smṛtimātranāthāṃ rakṣāvidhānacaturāṃ jagataḥ samantāt |
T02mahpratu:4: saṃvarṇitāṃ stutiśataiś ca tathāgatais taiḥ sarvārthasiddhinicayāṃ praṇamāmi bhūyaḥ || 2 ||
T02mahpratu:6: ekasmin samaye bhagavān mahāvajrameruśikharakūṭāgāre viharati sma |
T02mahpratu:26: [4] sambahulaiś ca mahāśrāvakaiḥ sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair
T02mahpratu:27: ucchinnabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair acintyaṛddhibalaprātihāryavikurvaṇamahāsthāmaprāptair asaṅgajñānadarśibhiḥ sarvair vigatamalair nirdagdhasarvakleśavāsanābījaiḥ |
T02mahpratu:118: [11] ity api bhagavān supravartitadharmacakraḥ supariniṣṭhitabuddhakāryaḥ suparipūrṇapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāraḥ suparigṛhītasarvajñatāmahābodhipāramitābhūmilābho jvalitadvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇālaṃkṛtaśarīraś caturaśītyanuvyañjanavirājitasarvāṅgāvayavaśobhaḥ sarvasattvānavalokitamūrdhānirjitaḥ sarvamārakarmakovidaḥ sarvasattvajñānapañcavidhacakṣuḥ sarvākāravaropetasarvajñajñānasamanvāgataḥ sarvabuddhadharmasamanvāgataḥ
T02mahpratu:122: duṣkaracaryāvinivartito dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇacaturaśītyanuvyañjanālaṃkṛtagātraśobhaḥ mahāvajraratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsane anekavajraratnamuktākiṅkiṇījālakalakalonnādite anekavajraratnavedikāpādapīṭhasupratiṣṭhite anekavajraratnamakaramukhodgīrṇalohitamuktāvalīnibaddhagaṇḍūṣake anekavajraratnapadmakarṇikāvilagnakarketanendranīlamahānīlapuṣparāgaraśmijvālāvabhāsite samantaprāsādike anekavajraratnaśalākāvibhūṣitoddaṇḍātapatrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrakṛtachāyāparikare anekakalpadrumopaśobhitavistāre sumerumātre vajraratnapadmāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02mahpratu:123: kāñcanaparvatarāja iva śriyā jvalan sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāmaṇḍalavirājitabhūmibhāgaḥ suparipūrṇacandra iva sarvalokapriyadarśano mahākalpavṛkṣa iva buddhadharmasaṃkusumito dharmaṃ deśayati sma ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma |
T02mahpratu:124: [12] atha khalu bhagavān mūrdhnaḥ saṃdher ūrṇākośāt sarvabuddhasaṃdarśanaṃ nāma raśmijālaṃ pramuñcati sma |
T02mahpratu:125: tena ca raśmijālenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsitaḥ sphuṭīkṛto 'bhūt |
T02mahpratu:126: yāvanti ca gaṅgānadīvālikopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi tāni sarvāṇi tenāvabhāsena sphuṭāny abhūvan
T02mahpratu:127: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavanto
T02mahpratu:128: 'nekasiṃhāsanavyūhakūṭāgāravimāneṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti sma sārdhaṃ mahāśrāvakair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikābhir devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragaiḥ atha khalu bhagavān vistīrṇāṃ parṣadam āmantrayate sma |
T02mahpratu:136: aḍakavatīṃ tathā gacched rākṣasāṇām ālayaṃ bhuvi || 4 ||
T02mahpratu:142: te sarve stambhitā bhonti pratisarasyaiva tejasā || 7 ||
T02mahpratu:143: paracakrā vinaśyanti kākhordā ye ca dāruṇāḥ |
T02mahpratu:144: mantrakarmā na bādhante mūlakarmāc ca mucyate || 8 ||
T02mahpratu:145: na viṣaṃ na garaṃ nāgni na śastraṃ naiva codakam |
T02mahpratu:146: aśanir vidyutaś caiva kālavāyur na bādhate || 9 ||
T02mahpratu:148: sarve 'rthās tasya sidhyanti jayaṃ prāpnoti nityaśaḥ || 10 ||
T02mahpratu:149: yaḥ kaścid dhārayed vidyāṃ kaṇṭhe bāhau baddhāpi vā |
T02mahpratu:150: tasya sarvāṇi kāryāṇi sidhyante nātra saṃśayaḥ || 11 ||
T02mahpratu:151: nityaṃ rakṣanti devendrā nāgarājās tathaiva ca |
T02mahpratu:155: vajrapāṇiś ca yakṣendro rājānaś caturas tathā |
T02mahpratu:156: tasya rakṣāṃ kariṣyanti divārātrau na saṃśayaḥ || 14 ||
T02mahpratu:160: ṛṣayaś ca mahātejā devāś caiva maharddhikāḥ || 16 ||
T02mahpratu:165: mahākālī ca dūtyaś ca vajradūtyas tathā parāḥ |
T02mahpratu:169: tathā dhanyā mahābhāgā padmakuṇḍalir eva ca |
T02mahpratu:171: mahātejā tathā devī dhanyā ca vidyunmālinī |
T02mahpratu:175: tasya rakṣāṃ kariṣyanti yasya vidyā kare sthitā |
T02mahpratu:177: śrīdevī sarasvatī caiva taṃ rakṣanti sadānugāḥ |
T02mahpratu:178: mahāpratisarām etāṃ yā strī dhārayate sadā || 25 ||
T02mahpratu:179: sarvasiddhir bhavet tasyāḥ putragarbhā ca nityaśaḥ |
T02mahpratu:180: sukhaṃ garbhāṇi vardhante sukhaṃ prasūyati gurviṇī || 26 ||
T02mahpratu:181: vyādhayaś cāpi naśyanti sarvapāpā na saṃśayaḥ |
T02mahpratu:184: śucir dhārayate yas tu striyo vā puruṣo 'pi vā || 28 ||
T02mahpratu:188: nityaṃ ca jvalate lakṣmyā puṇyarāśir vivardhate || 30 ||
T02mahpratu:192: kilbiṣāś caiva naśyanti pratyamitrās tathaiva ca || 32 ||
T02mahpratu:194: sarvakāmaṃdadā hy eṣā bhāvayed yas tu nityaśaḥ || 33 ||
T02mahpratu:195: tad idānīṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi bhūtasaṃghāḥ śṛṇotha me |
T02mahpratu:246: rakṣa 2 māṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca samantāt sarvatra |
T02mahpratu:249: rakṣa 2 māṃ sarvasattvānāṃ cānāthān atrāṇān aparāyaṇān |
T02mahpratu:300: tāraya māṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca bhagavati aṣṭamahābhayebhyaḥ sarvatra samantena diśābandhena vajraprākāravajrapāśabandhena
T02mahpratu:315: rakṣa 2 mama sarvasattvāṃś ca sarvatra sarvadā sarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvopadravebhyaḥ sarvopasargebhyaḥ sarvavyādhibhyaḥ sarvaduṣṭabhayabhītasya |sarvakalikalahavigrahavivādaduḥsvapnadurnimittāmaṅgalyapāpaviśodhani sarvayakṣarākṣasanāgavidāriṇi |
T02mahpratu:394: ye mama ahitaiṣiṇas teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ śarīraṃ jvālaya sarvaduṣṭacittānāṃ svāhā |
T02mahpratu:477: abhiṣiñcantu māṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca sarvatathāgatāḥ sarvavidyābhiṣekair mahāvajrakavacamudrāmudritaiḥ
T02mahpratu:480: [15] sahaśravaṇamātreṇāyaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur
T02mahpratu:482: yasya punar iyaṃ hṛdayagatā bhavati sa mahābrāhmaṇa vajrakāya iti veditavyaḥ |
T02mahpratu:485: [16] yadā kapilavastuni mahānagaravare rāhulabhadraḥ kumāro mātuḥ
T02mahpratu:486: kukṣigato 'bhūt tadā gopayā śākyakanyayā ātmānam agnikhadāyāṃ prakṣiptaḥ |
T02mahpratu:488: tadā rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ kukṣigata imāṃ vidyāṃ manasy akārṣīt |
T02mahpratu:489: asyā vidyāyā anusmaraṇamātreṇa so 'gnis tasmin kṣaṇe śītībhāvam upagataḥ |
T02mahpratu:490: tato gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyāḥ śarīram agninā na spṛṣṭam iti |
T02mahpratu:494: na ca viṣeṇa śakyaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayitum |
T02mahpratu:496: [18] yadā mahābrāhmaṇa śūrpārake mahānagaravare kośabalikasya śreṣṭhinaḥ
T02mahpratu:497: putro vidyāvādiko babhūva tena tadvidyābalena takṣako nāgarājā ākarṣitaḥ |
T02mahpratu:498: ākarṣayitvā ca pramādavaśād baddho na dāntaḥ |
T02mahpratu:499: yāvat tenāsau krodhād daṣṭaḥ sa tīvrāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati |
T02mahpratu:500: jānāti ca yathā me jīvitaṃ niruddham iti |
T02mahpratu:501: tatra bahavo vādikā āhūtā na ca kaścic chaknoti viṣaṃ ceṣṭayitum |
T02mahpratu:502: atha tatraiva śūrpārake mahānagare vimalaśuddhir nāmopāsikā prativasati mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatā
T02mahpratu:504: sā tasyāntikam upasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramyemāṃ mahāvidyāṃ pravartayām āsa |
T02mahpratu:505: ekavelāyām anusmṛtamātreṇa nirviṣaṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabdhaṃ kṛtvā tato mahāvyasanāt parimocayitvā imām eva mahāvidyāṃ hṛdayagatāṃ kārayati sma yathā vidhivad anujñātam iti |
T02mahpratu:506: [19] api ca mahābrāhmaṇa kiṃ parijñātam iti |
T02mahpratu:507: vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryām anupūrveṇānuvicaramāṇo rājā brahmadatta iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati |
T02mahpratu:508: tasya prātisīmiko balacakrarājā caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ saṃnāhya vārāṇasīṃ mahānagarīṃ parivārya vināśayitum ārabdhaḥ |
T02mahpratu:511: kiṃ nu khalu vayam upāyaṃ kuryāmo yenaitat paracakraṃ vinaśyet |
T02mahpratu:515: asti mama mahāpratisarā nāma mahāvidyārājñī yenāham imaṃ caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ parājayiṣyāmi bhasmīkariṣyāmi ca |
T02mahpratu:521: atha sa rājā brahmadatto nānāgandhodakena snātaśiraḥ śucivastraṃ prāvṛtya imaṃ mahāvidyārājaṃ yathāvidhinālikhya śiraḥkośe sthāpya imām eva vidyārājñīkavacaṃ kṛtvā saṃgrāmamadhye 'vatīrya
T02mahpratu:523: āmardya ca tāvad anayā śaraṇaṃ gata iti kṛtvāsau balacakrarājā mukta
T02mahpratu:524: [20] iti mahābrāhmaṇa pratyakṣamahānubhāveyaṃ mahāvidyārājñī sarvatathāgatahṛdayamudrādhiṣṭhitā pratyakṣa eveti dhārayitavyā |
T02mahpratu:526: paścime kāle paścime samaye alpāyuṣkāṇāṃ mandapuṇyānāṃ parīttabhāgyānāṃ sattvānāṃ hitāya draṣṭavyā
T02mahpratu:527: yaḥ kaścin mahābrāhmaṇa imāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ yathāvidhinā likhitvā bāhau kaṇṭhe vā dhārayiṣyati sa sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhito veditavyaḥ |
T02mahpratu:538: [21] anyatamasmin pradeśe bhikṣur aśrāddhas tathāgatakulaśikṣākhaṇḍakaḥ adattādāyī |
T02mahpratu:539: sukhāyadvārahārikaḥ sāṃghikaṃ cāturdiśikaṃ gaṇaprāptaṃ ca yad dravyaṃ tat paudgalikaṃ sarvam adhiṣṭhāya bhakṣayati |
T02mahpratu:540: yāvad apareṇa samayena mahatā vyādhinā spṛṣṭaḥ mahatīṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanām anubhavati |
T02mahpratu:541: sa tapasvī atrāṇo 'pratisaraṇo mahāntam utkrośanaśabdaṃ karoti |
T02mahpratu:542: atha tasminn eva pradeśe upāsako brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati |
T02mahpratu:544: śrutvā ca punar yena sa bhikṣus tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya tasya bhikṣor imāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ likhitvā kaṇṭhe badhnāti sma |
T02mahpratu:545: samanantarabaddhe ca mahāpratisare tasya bhikṣoḥ sarvā vedanāḥ praśāntāḥ sarvavyādhibhiḥ parimuktaḥ svasthaḥ saṃvṛtta iti |
T02mahpratu:546: sa tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt sūpasthitasmṛtiḥ kālagataḥ |
T02mahpratu:549: tac ca tasya mṛtaśarīraṃ bhikṣubhiḥ kūṭe sthāpitam
T02mahpratu:550: | sā tasya mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī kaṇṭhe baddhaivāvasthitā |
T02mahpratu:551: samanantaropapannasya tasya bhikṣos tasminn avīcau teṣāṃ nārakāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhavedanāḥ praśāntāḥ |
T02mahpratu:552: te ca nārakāḥ sattvāḥ sarvasukhasamarpitā abhūvan |
T02mahpratu:553: ye ca te mahāntā āvīcikā agniskandhās te 'pi
T02mahpratu:555: atha te yamapuruṣā vispandamānā yamasya dharmarājasyemaṃ niścayaṃ vistareṇārocayanti sma |
T02mahpratu:557: praśāntā dāruṇā duḥkhāḥ sattvānāṃ karmajāś ca ye || 1 ||
T02mahpratu:558: praśāntās te 'pi aṅgārā dehasthā dehināṃ sadā |
T02mahpratu:559: karapattrā na bādhante kṣuradhārā na sajjate || 2 ||
T02mahpratu:560: astrāś ca bhagnāḥ sarve praśāntā lohakumbhayaḥ |
T02mahpratu:561: asipattravane pattrā na bādhante karmajāḥ punaḥ || 3 ||
T02mahpratu:562: yamas tvaṃ dharmarājo 'si dharmeṇa śāsayase nṛṇām |
T02mahpratu:563: idaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ nālpaṃ tvam asmākaṃ vaktum arhasi || 4 ||
T02mahpratu:566: kim etat kathyatāṃ śīghraṃ katham etat punar bruvan |
T02mahpratu:570: avīcir yasya nāmedaṃ tenāsau saṃkaṭa ucyate |
T02mahpratu:571: karmaṇāṃ yasya vaicitryaṃ sattvā yena sukhīkṛtāḥ || 8 ||
T02mahpratu:572: sukhito hy eṣa sarvatra punar yāsyati surālayam |
T02mahpratu:573: yamo 'pi dharmarājā vai dṛṣṭvā kathayati vismitaḥ || 9 ||
T02mahpratu:575: yathā dhātuśatair vṛndaiḥ stūpaṃ śobhati śāstunaḥ || 10 ||
T02mahpratu:577: [22] atha te narakapālakā yakṣā yamasya dharmarājasyedaṃ vacanam abruvan |
T02mahpratu:580: pratipat smārayed yas tu sa na gacchati durgatim |
T02mahpratu:585: [23] atha te yamapuruṣā tasyām eva rātryāṃ puṣkalāvatīṃ gatāḥ |
T02mahpratu:591: [24] yāvat tasya tair yakṣaiḥ pratisarakūṭo nāma sthāpitaḥ |
T02mahpratu:592: atha te yakṣāḥ punar āgatya yamasya dharmarājasya niścayaṃ vistareṇārocayanti sma |
T02mahpratu:595: vacanaparyavasāne sa mahāsattvas taṃ nārakaṃ śarīraṃ vijahya trayastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ
T02mahpratu:596: tena hetunā pratisarapūrvī devaputra ity ucyate |
T02mahpratu:598: tasmād avaśyam eveyaṃ mahāpratisareti dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā likhitavyā yathāvidhinā nityaṃ śarīragatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayitavyā |
T02mahpratu:603: [26] mahābrāhmaṇa hiṅgumardane mahānagaravare vimalaśaṅkho nāma śreṣṭhī
T02mahpratu:606: atha sa mahāsārthavāho yānapātram āsādya mahāsamudre 'vatīrṇaḥ |
T02mahpratu:608: vināśayitukāmā nāgāś ca saṃkṣubdhā mahāntaṃ garjanāsphoṭaṃ kurvanti vidyudulkām utsṛjanti vajrāśaniṃ pravarṣitum ārabdhāḥ |
T02mahpratu:609: tatas te vaṇijo mahatā duḥkhenābhyāhatacittās taṃ mahāntaṃ nāgasaṃkṣobhaṃ vidyudulkāṃ vajrāśaniṃ cotsṛjantaṃ taiś ca timiṅgilaiḥ potam avaṣṭabdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāntam utkrośanāśabdaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ |
T02mahpratu:611: na ca kaścit teṣāṃ paritrāṇaṃ bhavati |
T02mahpratu:612: tatas te sārthavāhasyopagamya karuṇakaruṇam idaṃ vacanam abruvan |
T02mahpratu:616: mā bhair mā bhair vaṇijo bhavanto dhīratāṃ vrajata || 2 ||
T02mahpratu:618: tato dhīramanaso bhūtvā vaṇija idaṃ vacanam abruvan || 3 ||
T02mahpratu:619: kim etan mahāsattva brūhi śīghram avighnataḥ |
T02mahpratu:621: kathyatāṃ jñānamāhātmyaṃ paścāt tvaṃ kiṃ kariṣyasi |
T02mahpratu:622: tataḥ sārthapatis teṣām imāṃ vidyām udāharat || 5 ||
T02mahpratu:626: [27] tataḥ sa mahāsārthavāhas tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ likhitvā dhvajāgrāvaropitāṃ kārayati sma |
T02mahpratu:627: samanantaradhvajāgrāvaropite 'smin mahāpratisare sarva eva te timiṅgilās tat potam ekajvālībhūtaṃ paśyanti |
T02mahpratu:628: tatas te nāgā maitramanasas teṣām antike 'vatīrya pūjāṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ |
T02mahpratu:629: te ca timiṅgilā asyā eva mahāpratisarāvidyārājñyā anubhāvena dahyamānā niṣpalāyitā vilayaṃ gatās te ca sārthikās tair mahānāgair mahati mahāratnadvīpe prāpitā iti |
T02mahpratu:637: sarve ca duṣṭacittā mṛgapakṣiṇo daṃṣṭriṇo vinaśyanti |
T02mahpratu:643: ye ca tasmin viṣaye mahānāgās te ca samyag eva kālena kālaṃ varṣadhārā utsṛjanti |
T02mahpratu:644: yasmin viṣaye iyaṃ mahāvidyārājñī mahāpratisarā nāma pracariṣyati tatra taiḥ sattvair jñātvā pūjāsatkāraṃ kṛtvā nānāgandhair nānādhūpair nānāpuṣpair nānāvastraiḥ pariveṣṭayitvā caityasyopari dhvajāgrāvaropitāṃ kṛtvā nānāvādyatūryasaṃgītibhir vādyamānābhiḥ pradakṣiṇīkartavyā |
T02mahpratu:645: teṣāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yathācintitam āśāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti devatāḥ śakrabrahmaprabhṛtayaḥ |
T02mahpratu:646: athavā yathā yathā vidhinā likhyate tathā tathā samṛdhyate |
T02mahpratu:648: sukhena vardhate garbhaḥ sukhena ca prasūyate || 1 ||
T02mahpratu:654: tena rājñā jātamātreṇa pāṇiṃ prasārya mātuḥ stanaṃ gṛhītvā yāvad āptaṃ kṣīraṃ pītam |
T02mahpratu:655: tau ca stanau sahasparśamātreṇa suvarṇavarṇau saṃvṛttau |
T02mahpratu:657: tena kāraṇena rājñaḥ prasāritapāṇir iti nāma sthāpitam abhūt |
T02mahpratu:658: anyac ca tasya rājño yadā yācanakajanā āgacchanti tadā sa rājā dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārayaty antarīkṣe |
T02mahpratu:659: bodhisattvaḥ sa rājā tena hetunā tasya buddhābhiprasannā devatā divyai ratnaviśeṣaiḥ suvarṇamaṇibhiś ca pāṇiṃ paripūrayanti |
T02mahpratu:662: devānāṃ ca mahānti mahāpūjāsatkārāṇi karoti putrahetor na ca putraṃ pratilabhate |

T02mahpratu:732: tasya bhagavataḥ sarvamāraiḥ saparivārair anekamārakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparivṛtair nānārūpavirūpabhayabhairavaśabdākulair bahuvividhamāraviṣayavikurvaṇādhiṣṭhānair nānāpraharaṇavṛṣṭim abhinirmāyāgatya caturdiśaṃ parivāryānantāparyantamārakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrātirekāḥ pāpīyāṃso antarāyaṃ

T02mahpratu:736: romavivarād anekakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi saṃnaddhabaddhakavacānāṃ jvalitakhaḍgaparaśupāśamudgarāsitriśūlahastānām evaṃ vācaṃ pravyāharamāṇāni nirgacchanti |
T02mahpratu:737: gṛhnata 2 bandhata 2 duṣṭamārāṃ vidhvaṃsayata duṣṭacittānāṃ vicūrṇayata jīvitaṃ sarvaduṣṭagrahavighnavināyakānāṃ ye bhagavato viheṭhāṃ kurvanti |

T02mahpratu:742: [38] evaṃ hi mahābrāhmaṇa mahābalavegaṛddhipāramitāprāpteyaṃ mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī smaraṇamātreṇa sarvavyasanabhayabhairavebhyaḥ parimocayati āśayapariśuddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānyeṣāṃ duṣṭacetasām |
T02mahpratu:743: tasmāt tarhi mahābrāhmaṇa nityam evānusmaraṇena manasikāreṇa manasikartavyā |
T02mahpratu:744: sarvakālaṃ ca likhitvā kāyagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayitavyā |

T02mahpratu:749: atha te vadhakapuruṣās taṃ rājñājñaptaṃ puruṣaṃ gṛhītvā parvatavivaraṃ gatvāsiṃ kośān niṣkāsya taṃ puruṣaṃ jīvitād vyavaropayitum ārabdhāḥ |
T02mahpratu:750: tadā sa puruṣa imāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ manasā smṛtavān |
T02mahpratu:751: likhitāṃ ca dakṣine bāhau dhārayati sma |
T02mahpratu:752: tasya mahāsattvasyāsyā mahāvidyāyāḥ prabhāvenāsir ekajvālībhūtā khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ yathā pāṃsumayo vikīrṇa iti |
T02mahpratu:753: tatas te vadhakapuruṣā imam eva niścayaṃ rājño vistareṇārocayām āsuḥ |
T02mahpratu:755: gacchatha bhoḥ puruṣā anyatamasmin pradeśe yakṣaguhāsti |

T02mahpratu:759: samanantarachorite tasmin yakṣaguhāyāṃ tatas te yakṣāḥ sarve tuṣṭamanasaḥ pradhāvitā mānuṣaṃ bhakṣayiṣyāma iti te paśyanti asyā mahāpratisarāyā anubhāvena taṃ puruṣam

T02mahpratu:1134: dine dine svādhyāyaṃ kuryān mahāprājño bhavati |
T02mahpratu:1136: sarvapāpakarmāvaraṇāni cāsya niyatavedanīyāni niravaśeṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ yāsyanti |
T02mahpratu:1139: antaśo mahābrāhmaṇa iyaṃ mahāvidyāmantrapadarakṣā tiryagyonigatānām api mṛgapakṣiṇāṃ karṇapuṭe nipatiṣyati te sarve 'vaivartikā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T02mahpratu:1140: kaḥ punar vādo ya imāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ dhāraṇīṃ śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā rājā vā rājaputro vā brāhmaṇo vā kṣatriyo vā tadanyo vā yaḥ kaścit sakṛc chroṣyati śrutvā ca mahatyā śraddhayā gauraveṇādhyāśayena likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati tīvreṇa manasā bhāvayiṣyati parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati tasya mahābrāhmaṇa aṣṭāv akālamaraṇāni sarvathā na pratikāṅkṣitavyāni |
T02mahpratu:1142: na cāsya śarīre 'gnir na viṣaṃ na śastraṃ na garaṃ na kākhordakiraṇaṃ na
T02mahpratu:1143: mantrakarma na cūrṇayogo na cāṅgaśūlaṃ na jvaro na śiro 'rtir vā |
T02mahpratu:1149: yatra yatropapadyate tatra tatra jātau jātau jātismaro bhaviṣyati |
T02mahpratu:1153: | yathā cārkamaṇḍalaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ tathā raśmyeva bhāsakaro bhaviṣyati |
T02mahpratu:1154: yathā candramaṇḍalam amṛtena prabhavatāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ kāyaṃ prahlādayati tathā dharmāmṛtena sarvasattvānāṃ cittasaṃtānāni prahlādayiṣyati |
T02mahpratu:1155: sarvaduṣṭayakṣarākṣasabhūtapretapiśācāpasmāraḍākinīgrahavighnavināyakādayaḥ sarve 'sya mahāpratisaravidyārājaprabhāvena na śaktā viheṭhanāṃ kartum |
T02mahpratu:1156: upasaṃkramatāṃ ca teṣām ayaṃ mahāvidyārājā smartavyā |
T02mahpratu:1157: tatas te sarvaduṣṭacittā vidyādharasya vaśyā ājñāśravaṇavidheyā bhavanti |
T02mahpratu:1158: asyā evānubhāvena yad uta mahāpratisarāvidyārājñyā na cāsya śatrubhayaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T02mahpratu:1159: anatikramaṇīyaś ca bhaviṣyati sarvaśatrugaṇai rājarājamahāmātyair brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiś ca
T02mahpratu:1160: antaśo 'pi ca vadhyārho vadhakapuruṣair ucchritāny api śastrāṇi khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ gacchanti
T02mahpratu:1164: [48] rakṣoghnaṃ paramaṃ hy etat pavitraṃ pāpanāśanam |
T02mahpratu:1168: strīpuṃsayoḥ parā rakṣā vidyeyaṃ hi mahābalā |
T02mahpratu:1171: patha utpatham āpanna etāṃ vidyām anusmaret || 4 ||
T02mahpratu:1172: panthānaṃ labhate śīghraṃ bhojanaṃ pānam uttamam |
T02mahpratu:1173: kāyena manasā vācā yat kṛtaṃ pūrvajanmasu || 5 ||
T02mahpratu:1174: aśubhaṃ bahuvidhaṃ kiṃcit tat sarvaṃ kṣapayiṣyati |
T02mahpratu:1175: smaraṇād dhāraṇāc caiva udgrahāl lekhanād api || 6 ||
T02mahpratu:1178: evaṃ hi dharmarase prāpte pāpā gacchanti saṃkṣayam |
T02mahpratu:1179: sidhyante sarvakāryāṇi manasā yad yad īpsitam || 8 ||
T02mahpratu:1181: rājāgnir udakaṃ caiva vidyud vā taskaro 'pi vā || 9 ||
T02mahpratu:1183: te sarve pralayaṃ yānti vidyāyā lakṣajāpataḥ || 10 ||
T02mahpratu:1186: sarveṣu caiva sthāneṣu imāṃ vidyāṃ prayojayet |
T02mahpratu:1188: sidhyanty ayatnatas tāni vidyāto nātra saṃśayaḥ |
T02mahpratu:1192: caturaḥ pūrṇakumbhāṃś ca sthāpayed vidhinā budhaḥ || 2 ||
T02mahpratu:1193: puṣpāṇy avakiret tatra dhūpayed dhūpam uttamam |
T02mahpratu:1195: pūrvavad gandhapuṣpāṃś ca dadyāc cātra vidhānavit |
T02mahpratu:1196: catasras tīrikāḥ sthāpyāḥ sarvāś ca paṭṭabaddhikāḥ || 4 ||
T02mahpratu:1200: saptaśo japtayā cāsya rakṣāṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥ || 6 ||
T02mahpratu:1203: bhūyaś ca sapta vārān vai balikumbhasumantritam |
T02mahpratu:1205: ity evaṃ dakṣiṇe pārśve kṣipeta sapta eva tu |
T02mahpratu:1206: paścimāyāṃ ca saptaiva uttarāyāṃ tathā diśi || 9 ||
T02mahpratu:1207: adha ūrdhvaṃ tu saptaiva kṛtā rakṣā bhaviṣyati |
T02mahpratu:1210: nāsty asyāḥ parā kācid rakṣāvidyā tridhātuke || 11 ||
T02mahpratu:1211: [50] na tasya mṛtyur na jarā na rogo na cāpriyaṃ nāpi ca viprayogaḥ |
T02mahpratu:1212: yasyeyaṃ vidyā subhāṣitātmā bhaviṣyati mṛtyugaṇena pūjitaḥ || 1 ||
T02mahpratu:1213: yamo 'pi tasya varadharmarājā kariṣyate pūjāṃ sagauraveṇa |
T02mahpratu:1214: kathayiṣyate devapuraṃ hi gaccha kṣaṇikaṃ mamedaṃ narakaṃ kariṣyasi || 2 ||
T02mahpratu:1215: tato vimānaiś ca bahuprakārair maharddhiko yāti surālayaṃ śubham |
T02mahpratu:1216: evaṃ hy asau kiṃnarayakṣarākṣasaiḥ saṃpūjitas tatra sadā bhaviṣyati || 3 ||
T02mahpratu:1217: [51] vajrapāṇiś ca yakṣendra indraś caiva śacīpatiḥ |
T02mahpratu:1220: te ca sarve mahānāgā devatā ṛṣayas tathā || 2 ||
T02mahpratu:1221: asurā garuḍā gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāś ca mahoragāḥ |
T02mahpratu:1223: likhitāṃ dhārayet prājño bāhau baddhvā maharddhikām |
T02mahpratu:1224: mahatīṃ labhate pūjāṃ saṃpadaṃ cāpi nityaśaḥ || 4 ||
T02mahpratu:1225: [52] idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti |
